properties.name: Fishtrap Recreation Area
properties.notes: On Fishtrap Lake near Sprague; wildlife-rich shrub-steppe environment

properties.name: Juniper Dunes Wilderness
properties.notes: Primitive camping near the largest natural juniper forest in WA; no facilities

properties.name: Liberty Recreation Site
properties.notes: Near the historic gold mining town of Liberty; dispersed camping area

properties.name: Taunton Dispersed Area
properties.notes: Dispersed camping in Columbia Plateau; excellent stargazing

properties.name: Yakima River Canyon
properties.notes: Along the Yakima River between Ellensburg and Yakima; popular for fly fishing

properties.name: Colonial Creek North
properties.notes: On the north shore of Diablo Lake; stunning turquoise waters

properties.name: Colonial Creek South
properties.notes: Walk-in sites on south shore of Diablo Lake

properties.name: Cougar Rock
properties.notes: Near the Paradise area; excellent views of the Tatoosh Range

properties.name: Deer Park
properties.notes: High alpine meadow campground; no RVs; stunning views of the Strait of Juan de Fuca

properties.name: Fairholme
properties.notes: On the west end of Lake Crescent; boat launch access

properties.name: Goodell Creek
properties.notes: Year-round campground; popular for whitewater kayaking put-in

properties.name: Gorge Lake
properties.notes: Small primitive campground on Gorge Lake; walk-in sites

properties.name: Graves Creek
properties.notes: In the Quinault Rain Forest; trailhead for Enchanted Valley hike

properties.name: Heart O' the Hills
properties.notes: Main campground for Hurricane Ridge area access

properties.name: Hoh Rain Forest
properties.notes: In the heart of the temperate rain forest; Hall of Mosses trailhead

properties.name: Kalaloch
properties.notes: On coastal bluffs above the Pacific; beach access and tide pools

properties.name: Kettle Falls
properties.notes: On the upper Columbia/Lake Roosevelt; near historic Kettle Falls

properties.name: Mora
properties.notes: Near Rialto Beach; old-growth forest along Quillayute River

properties.name: Mowich Lake
properties.notes: Walk-in only; on the remote NW side of Rainier; no RVs or trailers

properties.name: Newhalem Creek
properties.notes: Main campground at the Ross Lake NRA gateway town of Newhalem

properties.name: North Fork
properties.notes: Small primitive campground in Quinault Valley

properties.name: Ohanapecosh
properties.notes: In old-growth forest on the SE side of Rainier; Grove of the Patriarchs nearby

properties.name: Queets
properties.notes: Remote campground in the Queets River valley; old-growth rainforest

properties.name: Snag Cove
properties.notes: Small boat-in or hike-in campground on Lake Roosevelt

properties.name: Sol Duc
properties.notes: Along the Sol Duc River; hot springs resort nearby

properties.name: South Beach
properties.notes: Primitive coastal campground just south of Kalaloch

properties.name: Spring Canyon
properties.notes: Near the town of Grand Coulee; swimming beach on Lake Roosevelt

properties.name: Staircase
properties.notes: At the foot of the North Fork Skokomish River; gateway to the Olympics

properties.name: White River
properties.notes: Trailhead for Sunrise area and Emmons Glacier route

properties.name: Beaver Lake
properties.notes: Remote lake in the Colville NF; wildlife viewing and fishing

properties.name: Beckler River
properties.notes: Along the Beckler River near Skykomish; popular for families

properties.name: Blue Lake Creek
properties.notes: Small creek-side campground near Trout Lake

properties.name: Bonaparte Lake
properties.notes: Scenic lake in northeast WA near Tonasket; good fishing

properties.name: Buck Creek
properties.notes: On the Suiattle River; access to Glacier Peak Wilderness

properties.name: Bumping Lake
properties.notes: On Bumping Lake reservoir; excellent hiking into the Norse Peak Wilderness

properties.name: Chiwawa Horse Camp
properties.notes: Horse camp in the Chiwawa River corridor; Glacier Peak Wilderness access

properties.name: Clear Creek
properties.notes: Small campground on the Sauk River near Darrington

properties.name: Coho
properties.notes: On Lake Cushman in Hood Canal area

properties.name: Cottonwood
properties.notes: On the Entiat River near Lake Chelan NRA; remote and uncrowded

properties.name: Denny Creek
properties.notes: Near Snoqualmie Pass; access to Franklin Falls and Alpine Lakes Wilderness

properties.name: Douglas Fir
properties.notes: On the North Fork Nooksack River; gateway to Mt. Baker

properties.name: Falls Creek
properties.notes: In the Quinault Valley; access to Lake Quinault and rainforest trails

properties.name: Lake Leo
properties.notes: Small alpine lake campground; hike-in only

properties.name: Rimrock Lake (Indian Creek)
properties.notes: On Rimrock Lake reservoir; fishing and swimming

properties.name: Soda Springs
properties.notes: Along Bumping River; natural carbonated spring nearby

properties.name: Steamboat Creek (Iron Creek)
properties.notes: Near Mt. St. Helens; along Cispus River corridor

properties.name: Takhlakh Lake
properties.notes: Stunning views of Mt. Adams from the lake; high-elevation campground

properties.name: Trout Lake Creek
properties.notes: Near Trout Lake; gateway to Mt. Adams Wilderness trails

properties.name: Walupt Lake
properties.notes: Remote lake near the Goat Rocks Wilderness; excellent fishing

properties.name: Wynoochee Lake
properties.notes: On Wynoochee Lake reservoir; swimming, fishing, and boating

properties.name: Battle Ground Lake State Park
properties.notes: Volcanic lake in Clark County; swimming and fishing

properties.name: Beacon Rock State Park
properties.notes: Below the famous basalt monolith in the Columbia River Gorge

properties.name: Bogachiel State Park
properties.notes: Along the Bogachiel River near Forks; gateway to Olympic backcountry

properties.name: Bruceport County Park
properties.notes: On Willapa Bay near South Bend

properties.name: Cape Disappointment State Park
properties.notes: Where the Columbia River meets the Pacific; two historic lighthouses

properties.name: Curlew Lake State Park
properties.notes: Scenic lake in Ferry County near Republic

properties.name: Deception Pass State Park
properties.notes: Largest state park campground; Cranberry Lake and North Beach loops

properties.name: Dosewallips State Park
properties.notes: At the confluence of the Dosewallips River and Hood Canal

properties.name: Fort Flagler State Park
properties.notes: Former military fort on Marrowstone Island; panoramic views of Puget Sound

properties.name: Fort Worden State Park
properties.notes: Historic fort on Port Townsend Bay; year-round camping available

properties.name: Grayland Beach State Park
properties.notes: Ocean beach camping near cranberry bogs

properties.name: Kitsap Memorial State Park
properties.notes: Wooded park on Hood Canal near Poulsbo

properties.name: Larrabee State Park
properties.notes: First state park in WA; saltwater access on Samish Bay

properties.name: Moran State Park (Orcas Island)
properties.notes: Four campgrounds near Summit Lake and Cascade Lake on Orcas Island

properties.name: Ocean City State Park
properties.notes: On the Long Beach Peninsula; vast sandy beach access

properties.name: Osoyoos Lake State Park
properties.notes: Warmest lake in WA on the Canadian border; excellent swimming

properties.name: Pacific Beach State Park
properties.notes: Right on the Pacific Ocean; popular for razor clam season

properties.name: Palouse Falls State Park
properties.notes: Washington State waterfall; 198-ft drop into the Palouse River canyon

properties.name: Paradise Point State Park
properties.notes: Along the East Fork Lewis River near Ridgefield

properties.name: Potlatch State Park
properties.notes: On Hood Canal; excellent oyster and shellfish harvesting

properties.name: Riverside State Park
properties.notes: Along the Spokane River near Spokane; Bowl and Pitcher area

properties.name: Seaquest State Park
properties.notes: Adjacent to Mount St. Helens National Volcanic Monument; views of the volcano

properties.name: Sequim Bay State Park
properties.notes: Protected bay in the Olympic rain shadow; calm waters for boating

properties.name: Steamboat Rock State Park
properties.notes: On Banks Lake in the Grand Coulee area; massive basalt butte

properties.name: Sun Lakes-Dry Falls State Park
properties.notes: Near the world's largest prehistoric waterfall; coulees and lakes
